website_summaries.verdict: Offered in a chewable tablet form, which some dogs will tolerate better than powders.
pros: Delivers results for dogs of any age, breed, or size
After a few weeks of regular use, you should notice a reduction in plaque buildup and bad breath for your dog
Made in America product that only uses safe ingredients
Most dogs like the taste of these soft tablets
cons: Dog must chew the tablet (instead of swallowing it) for effectiveness

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these pills!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pills! My dog's vet told me that he had too much tartar on his teeth and suggested to have them cleaned at the next visit. Apart from being expensive, putting my pet under anesthesia for the cleaning worried me more than a bit. I tried brushing his teeth however it was almost impossible, as he doesn't make it easy on you. After using these pills for a couple of months, my dog's teeth look great. I have checked them out and there is no plaque that I can see. Furthermore, there is no bad breath and his teeth are clean and have a nice clean gum line. I'm surely getting more of this product.
customer_reviews.author: MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for Bad Breath
customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever had the sweetest breath as a puppy and by 3 years his breath was like a sewer. I initially tried 3 pills a day, which is correct according to the label, but he did throw up a few times so I was suspicious as to the cause of this although his breath had improved. I give him just 1 pill a day now and mix it in with his food and everything is great. I think for some dogs it might be very important to mix it with their food and not give it alone several hours after the stomach has emptied.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: It truly works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. My dog does not eat it alone but I cut it in little pieces and put it in his food. After a month a big change is noticeable. He has a really bad tartar and this product helped him improve a lot! Even his breath is better now. I will keep buying! Seems expensive but it’s totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Super  Effective
customer_reviews.text: My senior pit had very bad breath, and vet mentioned oral surgery because her gums looked so unhealthy. 3 pills daily worked immediately, and within a week we are kissing and rubbing noses without bad breath. Now we are only using 1x every other day now after a month and a half usage but this item is pricey nevertheless but beats huge vet bill and putting her under anesthesia!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Fun treat for a Healthy Smile
customer_reviews.text: I was told about this product almost 2 years ago by another dog owner. I just now decided to buy it for my Chow Chow mix. I told her to open the package to get her treat well when she was done pretending to open it she found the tablet and had a little difficulty at first because it was new to her but she ate it anyways. I will use this product if it truly helps her out which I need it too work for her.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Great gums and no stinky breath!!!
customer_reviews.text: Last year when my dog was 14 the vet said his gums were really bad and he would need a good cleaning for his teeth with an estimation of about 400 dollars. I started giving him this dental supplement. After a year on this, we just left his 15 year appointment. The vet said his gums looked great and for his age his teeth were really good. His breath no longer stinks either. We will always use this on him and any other dog we get in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene F. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great tablets
customer_reviews.text: Great to maintain my dog's teeth. I had them cleaned before buying these, and they have kept her teeth in top condition. They are still white, and i never brush them. I do, however also give her Greenies. I think those two together will keep any dogs teeth and gums clean enough, where brushing probably isn't necessary.
customer_reviews.author: ken38016220

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but it works
customer_reviews.text: I recommended this to a friend recently and after a month of use her vet told her that she saw a vast improvement of her dogs teeth; she said that during a teeth cleaning there was build up but it came off very easily and the teeth were healthy. I would say the same. Only 4 stars because of the price and i have three dogs so it can get expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplements
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a pretty picky eater and generally doesn't like anything unless it is accompanied with gravy from canned food. These supplements actually went down the hatch without much fuss. After a couple of days, her teeth seem to be a bit cleaner than they were before.
customer_reviews.author: RatingMan

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The taste and scent are awful. My dogs will only take them if I crush and mix with something that has a bold flavor to mask the taste. For the expensive price, I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Not for big dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Not good for big dogs as the tablets are way too small and they just swallow them whole! They definitely need to be bigger to encourage them to chew them!! Love the ingredients but that's it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Battle

customer_reviews.title: Large dogs do not chew these.
customer_reviews.text: We tried these based on the reviews, but we lost $40 on this because our dog simply swallows the pills. She is a 90 lb Chocolate Lab, so that may be the reason, so I'd caution anyone with larger dogs against buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Angi H

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for 2_1\2 weeks. My dogs teeth are now white. Will continue using this. She comes running for her "treat".
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Day

customer_reviews.title: The ease of giving the tablets.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs' teeth hygiene has much improved! It's easy to break up the tablets and add to their food daily. They are small dogs and they each get 1/2 tablet daily.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's doing its job. A little expensive but so happy with results.
customer_reviews.author: CSV

customer_reviews.title: Great way to augment dental care for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I’m not great about brushing my dogs teeth regularly, so I use this product daily in the morning meal & brush weekly. It seems to be working great. Teeth are brighter w/much less tartar.
customer_reviews.author: All Wet

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesn't hate it
customer_reviews.text: The dog doesn't hate it, and it's good for him. So win win if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: AnimNations

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: The dogs line up for them before bed and they seem to have improved their breath and teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight D. Weidman

customer_reviews.title: Really healthy for dog gums
customer_reviews.text: The product is really healthy for dog gums. Really improved on the dentine and gum. Nice product
customer_reviews.author: Rachel O

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to get stuck in throat
customer_reviews.text: It made my dogs struggle to clear it from their throats. Don’t know if it works because I had to stop using it after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Margo L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: It does NO good if your dog refuses it.
customer_reviews.text: I received this for my Goldendoodle. He refuses to take these chewable tablets. I am sorry but this was a waste of my money. Look for something else!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Gall

customer_reviews.title: Great Dental Benefits!
customer_reviews.text: These pills work extremely well. I will keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Tripi

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog violently sick!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Softens everything and came home to my dog who threw up and pooped EVERYWHERE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Richards

customer_reviews.title: Non prescription dental support
customer_reviews.text: Sparky is 13 and he has lost a tooth. I don't want him to lose more so I researched canine dental supplements. So far so good. Will have to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Vonny

customer_reviews.title: My dogs do not like taste wont eat them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs will not eat them any suggestions on how to get them to eat them or send them back ?
customer_reviews.author: SHERI J GUDVANGEN

customer_reviews.title: Dogs won't eat
customer_reviews.text: My dogs both tasted it and spit it out on the floor. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work, but my dog absolutely will not eat this.
customer_reviews.author: glenda douglass

customer_reviews.title: Improved my pup's breath
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs has terrible breath, even though he is still young and has basically zero tartar on his teeth. We also go to the vet regularly and he seems all around healthy, so I don't think there is an underlying illness that causes his bad breath. So I decided to give these tablets a shot to see if they will help with his bad breath. Turns out they do. I don't know how, but I definitely noticed a difference since I started feeding him one of these tablets every day. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Erna

product_meta.title: Nutrition Strength Dental Care for Dogs, Daily Supplement for Healthy Dog Gums and Teeth with Organic Kelp, Strawberry Leaf, Pumpkin Seed for Dog Mouth and Teeth Cleaning, 120 Chewable Tablets
feature_bullets: HIGHEST-RATED DOG DENTAL CHEWS: 365-day guarantee: If you are not happy with our dental treats for dogs, simply contact us for a full refund. We want you to be completely satisfied with our dog dental care supplement, which promotes healthy dog gums and teeth.

MOST EFFECTIVE DOG ORAL CARE: A complete formula for dogs of all ages to support their teeth and gums. Formulated with essential vitamins, minerals and nutrients, our dog dental chews promote your pet's well-being by helping to soften and remove plaque and tartar. After a few weeks of regular use, plaque and tartar build-up falls off or you can brush it off with a toothbrush.

SUPPORT FOR EFFECTIVE DOG DENTAL CARE: Nutrition Strength's Dental Supplement for Dogs is made with the highest quality ingredients. It is specifically designed to promote healthy dog gums and teeth and to freshen your pet's breath. Manufactured using the highest standards, our dental treats for dogs are safe for use with your dog's medications.

IDEAL FOR DOGS OF ALL AGES, SHAPES AND SIZES: Nutrition Strength's dog teeth cleaning supplement is designed for canines of any breed, age and size. Your furry four-legged friends will love taking our tasty dog dental chews daily.

MADE IN THE USA: Nutrition Strength's dog dental cleaning chews are made using 100% green, carbon-neutral technology and are 3rd party certified for purity and potency. Our premium dog plaque remover supplement meets the strictest animal supplement manufacturing guidelines and is made with carefully selected ingredients.
